CustomField.description: You must dial + then the country code and number you wish to call. Example: +12125551313. Specify the global country code setting or record level country code to automatically add "+country code" to your Click-to-Call links. GoTo App Setup| Customize| Develop| Custom Settings| Click-to-Call Configuration Manager.
CustomField.formula: IF(MobilePhone != null, HYPERLINK("skype:"+IF( ClickToDial__Country_Code__c != null,ClickToDial__Country_Code__c, $Setup.ClickToDial__ConfigurationManager__c.ClickToDial__Global_Country_Code__c ) & SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(MobilePhone, '-', ''),' ' ,''),')',''),'(',''),'.',''),',','') +"?call", IF( ClickToDial__Country_Code__c != null,ClickToDial__Country_Code__c, $Setup.ClickToDial__ConfigurationManager__c.ClickToDial__Global_Country_Code__c ) & SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(MobilePhone, '-', ''),' ' ,''),')',''),'(',''),'.',''),',','') , "_self\" onclick=\"createTask('"+ MobilePhone+"', '"+ Id +"','"+ $Api.Session_ID +"',true,'"+ $User.Id +"','"+$Setup.ClickToDial__ConfigurationManager__c.ClickToDial__EnableAutoCallLog__c+"');\" "),'')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: You must dial + then the country code and number you wish to call. Example: +12125551313. Specify the global country code setting or record level country code to automatically add "+country code" to your Click-to-Call links.
CustomField.label: Click-to-Call Mobile
